body:
```
===> Building: p6doc
`build-depends` is missing entries. Attemping to mimick missing dependencies...
===SORRY!===
Could not find Shell::Command in:
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/doc.git/eab83e0ed4e1a9ef9b8870af732cd9b5554e0d02/lib/.precomp
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/doc.git/eab83e0ed4e1a9ef9b8870af732cd9b5554e0d02
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/doc.git/eab83e0ed4e1a9ef9b8870af732cd9b5554e0d02/lib
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/uri.git/2e78b6c1ccf5795ab95b883244a7fb4dc9e12629/lib
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/p6-File-Temp.git/11cf08f6a64aad19b9b60793200f212a8dcb48be/lib
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/p6-file-directory-tree.git/9970d80c0404f640eeda3c623c39a13496c9a0b2/lib
    /home/nickl/.zef/store/panda.git/56e95bca3711d7972e00329b6725da78f8fa1817/lib
    /home/nickl/.perl6
    /home/nickl/.rakudobrew/moar-nom/install/share/perl6/site
    /home/nickl/.rakudobrew/moar-nom/install/share/perl6/vendor
    /home/nickl/.rakudobrew/moar-nom/install/share/perl6
    CompUnit::Repository::AbsolutePath<56575920>
    CompUnit::Repository::NQP<45550152>
    CompUnit::Repository::Perl5<45550192>
```

`Shell::Command` may come with `panda`, but it is `use`d directly by `Build.pm`. This `Could not find` happens with `zef` because it uses clean environments for each distribution to be installed (allowing dry installs, or to avoid installing _anything_ if any dependency fails instead of installing everything up until the failure).

Its also needed for creating proper topography
title: Not all dependencies are listed
